function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Retrospective ecological study on the level of administrative districts and district-free cities in Germany.","Impact":"Limited applicability to clinical level statements.","Mitigation":"Use in conjunction with clinical studies for a comprehensive understanding.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Population-level researchers and policymakers.","Owner":"Health research institutions."},{"Description":"Reliance on officially recorded COVID-19 cases, which are a lower limit of the actual number of cases present.","Impact":"Underestimation of the true number of cases.","Mitigation":"Use statistical methods to estimate the dark figure of unreported cases.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and estimation techniques.","People":"Epidemiologists and public health analysts.","Owner":"Health research institutions."},{"Description":"Use of socio-economic, demographic, and health-related covariables from public sources.","Impact":"Potential bias in the covariable selection and data quality.","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and data validation procedures.","Technologies":"Statistical software for sensitivity analyses and data validation tools.","People":"Data analysts and researchers.","Owner":"Health research institutions."}]}
